meteoroids.Meteoroids.controllers.gamestates

Class GameStatePlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • meteoroids.Meteoroids.controllers.gamestates.GameStateMachine
      • meteoroids.Meteoroids.controllers.gamestates.GameStatePlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller

    public class GameStatePlay
extends GameStateMachine
    Playing game state. This holds all the different levels and initializes them when needed. GameStatePlay changes the levels and keeps track of the current play.
    Author:
    vpyyhtia

      • fixedScreen

        public void fixedScreen(boolean keepStuffInsideWindow)
        This method changes how the camera works. Setting keepStuffInsideWindow true, camera stops following player and player's ship can move from other edge to the other. Setting it false, player will be in the middle of the window with a following camera.
        Parameters:
        keepStuffInsideWindow - true keeps the window still and doesn't follow the player
